## ExifData.OECF property

Gets or sets the Opto-Electric Conversion Function (OECF) specified in ISO 14524.

```csharp
public byte[] OECF { get; set; }
```

## Property Value

The Opto-Electric Conversion Function (OECF) specified in ISO 14524.
